description.value:
You create a molecular bond between an unattended object you touch (or an object you're holding) and another object or surface that object is touching. Pulling the object free of that surface requires a successful [[/act force-open]]{Athletics} check against your spell DC to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Force Open].

If you instead touch one unoccupied 5-foot square, that surface becomes charged with adhering magic. That space becomes greater difficult terrain.

target.value: 1 held or unattended object or a 5-foot- square surface
